issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Genymotion emulator not generating any Analytics

I run an app on a Genymotion 2.0.3 Nexus One 4.3 emulator and no analytics are generated (Sessions, installs, events).

If I run the same app on an Android emulator (in exactly the same fashion and app), I do get analytics.
fields.summary: Genymotion emulator not generating any Analytics

comments.body: [~ingo] Seems like an SDK issue in terms of support for Genymotion, since the Android emulator sends analytics correctly. Moving over to TIMOB for investigation.
